description.en: A world of magic and swords, legends of dragons and heroes

prompt.en: I choose the Fantasy World to begin my adventure. This is a world full of magic and mysterious powers, with ancient magical academies, mystical forests, dangerous dungeons, and mighty dragon clans. In this world, heroes wield magic swords and staffs, battling evil wizards and fierce monsters. Please create an engaging fantasy adventure story for me, where I can be a young mage apprentice, a brave knight, or an adventurer with special abilities.

description.en: Interstellar travel, artificial intelligence, future technology

prompt.en: I choose the Sci-Fi Future world to begin my adventure. This is a highly advanced technological era where humanity has mastered interstellar travel and established space colonies. In this world, artificial intelligence, robots, and genetic modification technologies are highly advanced, while also featuring sci-fi elements like alien civilizations and time travel. Please create a technology-rich future adventure story for me, where I can be an interstellar explorer, scientist, space officer, or a cyberpunk character with body modifications.

description.en: Urban legends, supernatural phenomena, modern adventures

prompt.en: I choose the Modern City world to begin my adventure. This is a seemingly ordinary modern city that hides many supernatural phenomena and urban legends. In this world, mysterious events, people with superpowers, secret organizations, and unsolved mysteries lurk in ordinary people's lives. Please create a mysterious adventure story set in a modern background, where I can be an investigative journalist, someone awakening superpowers, a secret agent, or an ordinary person accidentally involved in supernatural events.

description.en: Ancient dynasties, historical figures, time-travel adventures

prompt.en: I choose the Historical Journey world to begin my adventure. I will travel to a historical period, which could be ancient Chinese dynasties, medieval Europe, ancient Egypt, ancient Greece and Rome, or any historical era. In this world, I will meet famous historical figures, participate in major historical events, or change the course of history. Please create a time-travel adventure story rich in historical background, allowing me to experience the culture and life of different eras.

description.en: Haunted house exploration, mysterious events, horror survival

prompt.en: I choose the Horror Mystery world to begin my adventure. This is a dark world full of horror and suspense elements, featuring haunted mansions, eerie towns, mysterious rituals, and supernatural evil spirits. In this world, I need to face various terrifying threats, solve mysteries, and survive. Please create a thrilling horror adventure story for me, creating a scary atmosphere while moderately controlling the horror level, focusing on suspense and puzzle-solving.

description.en: Cowboy duels, gold rush fever, wilderness survival

prompt.en: I choose the Wild West world to begin my adventure. This is the 19th-century American frontier period, a wilderness world filled with cowboys, Native Americans, gold prospectors, and outlaws. In this world, justice and evil face off in the vast wilderness, with intense gunfights, horseback chases, and wilderness survival. Please create an adventure story full of Western flavor for me, where I can be a righteous sheriff, a wandering cowboy, a gold-seeking adventurer, or a revenge-seeking gunslinger.

description.en: Age of exploration, treasure hunting, maritime legends

prompt.en: I choose the Pirate Adventure world to begin my adventure. This is an oceanic world from the Age of Exploration, filled with pirate ships, treasure maps, mysterious islands, and maritime legends. In this world, I will sail across turbulent seas, search for legendary treasures, engage in fierce naval battles with other pirate ships, and explore unknown islands. Please create a story full of maritime adventure spirit for me, where I can be a pirate captain, treasure hunter, naval officer, or an adventurer who accidentally boarded a pirate ship.

description.en: Nuclear wasteland, zombie siege, doomsday survival

prompt.en: I choose the Post-Apocalyptic Wasteland world to begin my adventure. This is a world that has experienced nuclear war, viral outbreaks, or other doomsday disasters, where civilization has collapsed and survivors struggle to live in the ruins. In this world, I need to face mutated creatures, hostile factions, resource scarcity, and environmental dangers. Please create a doomsday survival adventure story for me, where I can be a wasteland wanderer, a guardian of survivor settlements, or an explorer searching for safe havens.

description.en: Ragnarok, heroic epics, mythological revival

prompt.en: I choose the Mythological Legends world to begin my adventure. This is a world where gods and mortals coexist, where Greek, Norse, Chinese, Indian and other mythological systems converge. In this world, I will encounter Olympian gods, Norse Ã†sir, Chinese immortals, or other mythological beings, participating in epic adventures. Please create a legendary story full of mythological elements for me, where I can be a descendant of deities, a chosen hero, a mythological creature, or a mortal granted divine power.

description.en: Victorian era, steam machinery, industrial revolution

prompt.en: I choose the Steampunk world to begin my adventure. This is a Victorian-era styled world powered primarily by steam, filled with intricate gear mechanisms, airships, steam robots, and marvelous inventions. In this world, scientists create various steam-powered devices, nobles live in magnificent mansions, while workers toil in massive factories. Please create an adventure story full of industrial aesthetics for me, where I can be a genius inventor, steam mechanic, adventurer, or a revolutionary fighting oppression.

description.en: Underwater cities, mermaid legends, deep-sea exploration

prompt.en: I choose the Underwater World to begin my adventure. This is a mysterious world entirely located in the ocean depths, featuring magnificent underwater cities, coral palaces, deep-sea behemoths, and mermaid kingdoms. In this world, I will explore unknown trenches, search for the lost Atlantis, communicate with marine life, and discover the secrets of the deep sea. Please create an adventure story full of oceanic fantasy for me, where I can be a deep-sea explorer, mermaid, ocean mage, or an adventurer with underwater breathing abilities.

description.en: Galactic empires, interstellar wars, cosmic heroes

prompt.en: I choose the Space Opera world to begin my adventure. This is a grand galactic setting filled with interstellar empires, space fleets, alien races, and cosmic-scale conflicts. In this world, I will participate in galactic political struggles, pilot starships, make contact with different alien civilizations, and save the universe from peril. Please create an epic space adventure story for me, where I can be a starfleet commander, a Jedi-like cosmic knight, a diplomat, or a cosmic hero with special abilities.

description.en: Immortal cultivation, ascension to immortality, martial arts competition

prompt.en: I choose the Cultivation World to begin my adventure. This is an Eastern fantasy world centered on immortal cultivation and qi refinement, featuring various sects, spiritual mountains and blessed lands, immortal artifacts, and cultivation realms. In this world, I will improve my realm through cultivation, learn powerful spells, search for precious heavenly materials and earthly treasures, with the ultimate goal of ascending to immortality. Please create a cultivation story full of Eastern mystical elements for me, where I can be a new sect disciple, a rogue cultivator, a demonic cultivator, or a reincarnated immortal.

description.en: Locked room murders, deductive puzzles, crime suspense

prompt.en: I choose the Detective Mystery world to begin my adventure. This is a world full of mysteries and deduction, featuring complex criminal cases, cunning criminals, and clever schemes. In this world, I need to solve various unsolved cases by observing details, analyzing evidence, and logical reasoning. Please create a reasoning adventure story full of intellectual battles for me, where I can be a famous detective, police officer, private investigator, or an ordinary person involved in a case, focusing on logical deduction and puzzle-solving processes.

description.en: Chivalric spirit, castle sieges, court intrigue

prompt.en: I choose the Medieval Times world to begin my adventure. This is an authentic medieval European setting with feudal systems, knightly classes, castle fortresses, and religious influences. In this world, I will experience the honor and responsibility of knights, participate in castle sieges, become involved in court political struggles, or witness major historical turning points. Please create a historically rich medieval adventure story for me, where I can be a knight, noble, merchant, peasant, or wandering minstrel.

description.en: Ninja techniques, shadow clones, ninja villages

prompt.en: I choose the Ninja World to begin my adventure. This is a Japanese fantasy world centered on ninjas, featuring various ninja villages, secret ninja techniques, chakra energy, and ninja missions. In this world, I will learn various ninja arts, participate in battles between ninjas, execute secret missions, and continuously grow on the ninja path. Please create an adventure story full of ninja elements for me, where I can be a rookie genin, experienced jonin, rogue ninja, or a ninja with special bloodline limits.

description.en: Enchanted forests, fairy tale princesses, magical creatures

prompt.en: I choose the Fairy Tale Kingdom world to begin my adventure. This is a fantasy world full of fairy tale colors, featuring enchanted forests, fairy tale castles, kind princesses, evil witches, and various magical creatures. In this world, good and evil are clearly defined, magic is filled with warm power, and every story has a happy ending. Please create a heartwarming and imaginative fairy tale adventure story for me, where I can be a brave prince, kind princess, forest sprite, or a wizard who helps others.

description.en: Giant mechas, war machines, future warriors

prompt.en: I choose the Mecha Era world to begin my adventure. This is a future world where giant mechas dominate warfare, featuring various models of combat mechas, mecha pilots, military bases, and mecha wars. In this world, I will pilot powerful mechas in battle, defend my homeland, or participate in mecha competitions. Please create a mecha adventure story full of mechanical aesthetics for me, where I can be an ace mecha pilot, mecha engineer, military commander, or a resistance fighter.

description.en: Blood clan legends, eternal night city, dark nobility

prompt.en: I choose the Vampire World to begin my adventure. This is a dark world where vampires and humans coexist, featuring ancient vampire families, mysterious vampire councils, demon hunter organizations, and eternal nights. In this world, I will explore vampire secrets, participate in political struggles between vampire clans, or hunt evil vampires as a hunter. Please create a dark adventure story full of Gothic atmosphere for me, where I can be a newborn vampire, vampire noble, vampire hunter, or a human drawn into the vampire world.

description.en: Time machines, parallel universes, temporal paradoxes

prompt.en: I choose the Time Travel world to begin my adventure. This is a sci-fi world where I can freely travel through time and space, featuring time machines, parallel universes, temporal paradoxes, and time guardians. In this world, I will travel to different eras and parallel worlds, correct timeline errors, or prevent temporal disasters. Please create a sci-fi adventure story full of temporal elements for me, where I can be a time traveler, time guardian, temporal researcher, or an ordinary person who accidentally gained time-space abilities.

description.en: Superpower users, justice league, saving the world

prompt.en: I choose the Superhero world to begin my adventure. This is a modern world where superheroes and supervillains coexist, featuring various superpowers, hero organizations, villain alliances, and missions to save the world. In this world, I will use superpowers to protect innocent people, fight evil forces, join hero teams, and take on the responsibility of defending the world. Please create a superhero adventure story full of heroism for me, where I can be a rookie superhero, veteran hero, anti-hero, or an ordinary person awakening superpowers.

description.en: Alien civilizations, first contact, interstellar diplomacy

prompt.en: I choose the Alien World to begin my adventure. This is a universe filled with various alien life forms and civilizations, featuring strange alien creatures, advanced alien technology, complex interstellar politics, and cultural conflicts. In this world, I will make contact with different alien species, learn their cultures, participate in interstellar diplomacy, or explore unknown alien worlds. Please create a sci-fi adventure story full of alien elements for me, where I can be an interstellar diplomat, xenobiologist, space explorer, or an Earthling who accidentally arrived in an alien world.

description.en: Uninhabited island, wilderness survival, resource management

prompt.en: I choose the Desert Island Survival world to begin my adventure. This is a world where I need to survive in harsh environments, possibly an uninhabited island, primitive forest, polar ice field, or desert oasis. In this world, I need to find food and water sources, build shelters, craft tools, and deal with threats from natural disasters and wild animals. Please create an adventure story full of survival challenges for me, where I can be a shipwreck survivor, wilderness explorer, survival expert, or an ordinary person trapped in a dangerous environment.

description.en: Subconscious exploration, dream manipulation, psychological adventure

prompt.en: I choose the Dream World to begin my adventure. This is a surreal world existing in dreams and subconsciousness, featuring bizarre dreamscapes, symbolic scenes, distorted reality rules, and psychological adventures. In this world, I can manipulate dreams, enter others' dreams, face inner fears and desires, and explore the deep mysteries of the subconscious. Please create a dream adventure story full of psychological elements for me, where I can be a dream walker, psychotherapist, dream guardian, or an ordinary person trapped in dreams.

description.en: Time is driven by giant clocks, gears control fate, and temporal distortions cause disasters

prompt.en: I choose the Clockwork Realm to begin my adventure. In this world, time is not linear but controlled by giant clockwork mechanismsâ€”gears, springs, and pendulums. Temporal distortions can collapse reality, erase memories, or rewrite destinies. Please create an adventure full of time puzzles and mechanical wonders, where I can be a time mechanic, fate observer, time-lost soul, or a hero trying to restore the timeline.

description.en: Mirrors are gateways to parallel selves, and the reflected world hides the truth

prompt.en: I choose the Mirror World to begin my adventure. This is a parallel space connected through mirrors, each reflecting a different version of youâ€”perhaps one you never became. The mirror world hides forgotten memories, sealed truths, and swapped destinies. Please create a psychologically thrilling and philosophical adventure, where I can be a mirror-lost soul, a mirror spirit, a walker between reality and illusion, or a seeker of true identity.

description.en: Music is magic, melody shapes reality, and discord brings disaster

prompt.en: I choose the Symphony of Sound to begin my adventure. This is a fantasy world built from music, where melodies create cities, harmonies heal wounds, and noise is a deadly weapon. The world's balance depends on an eternal symphony. Please create a musically magical adventure, where I can be a melody mage, a deaf composer, a sound spirit envoy, or a tuner trying to restore cosmic harmony.

description.en: Everything is made of paper, writing creates, tearing destroys

prompt.en: I choose the Paper Realm to begin my adventure. This is a 2D world made of paper, where writing creates life and tearing destroys reality. Books are gateways to other dimensions, and ink is the most precious resource. Please create a literary and fantastical adventure, where I can be a paper spirit, a scribe, a librarian, or a hero trying to stop the 'Blank Plague' from erasing existence.

description.en: Plants are sentient, gardens are the world's core, seasons are shaped by emotions

prompt.en: I choose the Eternal Garden to begin my adventure. In this world, plants are sentient and speak, each garden is a micro-universe, and emotions shape the seasons. Please create a nature-magic adventure, where I can be a gardener, a flower-speaker, a plant spirit, or a chosen guardian of the 'Seed of Worlds'.

description.en: The carnival never ends, performance is reality, and the audience may never leave

prompt.en: I choose the Eternal Carnival to begin my adventure. This is a world trapped in perpetual night, where performers wield reality-bending powers and audiences may never escape. Please create a surreal and eerie adventure, where I can be an escapee, beast tamer, phantom jester, or an 'outsider' trying to uncover the carnival's dark truth.

description.en: Color is energy, hue is territory, losing color means losing oneself

prompt.en: I choose the Chromatic Dimension to begin my adventure. In this world, color is energy and identity, each hue-region has unique laws, and those who lose color fade into transparency. Please create a visually and philosophically rich adventure, where I can be a color weaver, a colorless one, a hue thief, or a guardian trying to stop the 'Gray Erosion' from consuming all.

description.en: Every book is a world, librarians are gods, and missing pages can destroy universes

prompt.en: I choose the Infinite Library to begin my adventure. This library contains all possible worlds, each book a complete universe, and librarians are deities maintaining cosmic order. Please create a knowledge-rich adventure, where I can be a 'bookwalker', a restorer of lost pages, a rogue librarian, or a thief trying to steal the 'Book of Creation'.

description.en: Grains are time fragments, deserts are forgotten memories, storms can rewrite history

prompt.en: I choose the Realm of Sand to begin my adventure. This desert world is made of time fragmentsâ€”each grain a forgotten memory. When sandstorms rise, history is rewritten. Please create a time-philosophical adventure, where I can be a 'sandwalker', memory scavenger, forgotten king, or a time traveler trying to stop the 'Eternal Sandstorm'.

description.en: Crystals hold consciousness, refraction clones personalities, shattering splits souls

prompt.en: I choose the Crystal Dimension to begin my adventure. This world uses crystals to store consciousness and memoryâ€”refraction clones minds, shattering splits souls. Please create a psychological sci-fi adventure, where I can be a crystal envoy, a shattered one, a crystal miner, or a wanderer trying to reassemble their lost selves.

description.en: Temperature defines existence, absolute zero is oblivion, heat is currency and life

prompt.en: I choose the Zerozone to begin my adventure. In this world, temperature is law, heat is life, and absolute zero means annihilation. Please create a survival-philosophical adventure, where I can be a heat thief, frostbound, thermal engineer, or a savior trying to ignite the 'Eternal Flame'.

description.en: Sound never fades, echoes are soul shadows, silence is the deadliest weapon

prompt.en: I choose the Echo Realm to begin my adventure. In this world, sound never diesâ€”echoes are past souls, and the silent are heretics. Please create an acoustically magical and philosophical adventure, where I can be a Silent One, echo hunter, sound spirit, or a rebel trying to stop the 'Eternal Silence' project.

description.en: The world is a maze, exits are entrances, and the lost become part of it

prompt.en: I choose the Endless Labyrinth to begin my adventure. This ever-shifting maze world distorts space and direction, and the labyrinth itself is sentient. Please create a spatial-puzzle adventure with existential themes, where I can be a wall-speaker, child of the maze, escapee, or a pilgrim seeking the 'Heart of the Labyrinth'.

description.en: Food is faith, hunger is sin, the feast never ends, and to eat is to become the dish

prompt.en: I choose the Eternal Feast to begin my adventure. In this world, food is religion, the feast is eternal, and eating grants attributesâ€”but also risks being consumed. Please create a fantastical and horrific adventure of appetite, where I can be a taste hunter, anti-feast priest, hunger artist, or a rebel gourmet trying to end the 'Endless Menu'.

description.en: Shadows are soul copies, darkness has weight, and light is a scarce resource

prompt.en: I choose the Shadow Realm to begin my adventure. In this world, shadows are soul copies that may awaken and betray their owners. Light is precious, darkness has mass. Please create a gothic and psychological thriller adventure, where I can be a shadowless one, shadow dancer, light thief, or a believer of light trying to stop the 'Eternal Nightfall'.
